trans-unit.source: Converts a bitmap to a specified pixel format

seg-source.mrk: Converts a bitmap to a specified pixel format

target.mrk: Converts a bitmap to a specified pixel format

trans-unit.source: Handle to a Bitmap to which the effect is applied.

seg-source.mrk: Handle to a Bitmap to which the effect is applied.

target.mrk: Handle to a Bitmap to which the effect is applied.

trans-unit.source: Pixel format constant that specifies the new pixel format ($GDIP_PXF*).

seg-source.mrk: Pixel format constant that specifies the new pixel format ($GDIP_PXF*).

target.mrk: Pixel format constant that specifies the new pixel format ($GDIP_PXF*).

trans-unit.source: DitherType constant that specifies the dithering algorithm ($GDIP_DitherType*).

seg-source.mrk: DitherType constant that specifies the dithering algorithm ($GDIP_DitherType*).

target.mrk: DitherType constant that specifies the dithering algorithm ($GDIP_DitherType*).

trans-unit.source: PaletteType constant that specifies a standard palette to be used for dithering ($GDIP_PaletteType*).

seg-source.mrk: PaletteType constant that specifies a standard palette to be used for dithering ($GDIP_PaletteType*).

target.mrk: PaletteType constant that specifies a standard palette to be used for dithering ($GDIP_PaletteType*).

trans-unit.source: Structure that specifies the palette whose indexes are stored in the pixel data of the converted bitmap.

seg-source.mrk: Structure that specifies the palette whose indexes are stored in the pixel data of the converted bitmap.

target.mrk: Structure that specifies the palette whose indexes are stored in the pixel data of the converted bitmap.

trans-unit.source: [optional] Real number in the range 0.0 through 100.0 that specifies which pixels in the source bitmap will map to the transparent color in the converted bitmap.

seg-source.mrk: Real number in the range 0.0 through 100.0 that specifies which pixels in the source bitmap will map to the transparent color in the converted bitmap.

target.mrk: Real number in the range 0.0 through 100.0 that specifies which pixels in the source bitmap will map to the transparent color in the converted bitmap.

trans-unit.source: False and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).

target.mrk: False and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).

trans-unit.source: -1 - GDIPlus.dll does not support this function.

target.mrk: -1 - GDIPlus.dll does not support this function.

trans-unit.source: The original pixel data in the bitmap is replaced by the new pixel data.

seg-source.mrk: The original pixel data in the bitmap is replaced by the new pixel data.

target.mrk: The original pixel data in the bitmap is replaced by the new pixel data.

trans-unit.source: Convert to a 16-color bitmap (4 bits per pixel) using FixedHalftone27 dithering
